variable.name: D18PSTYR
variable.description: PHYSICAL ACTIVITY PAST YEAR. [1=Physically inactive, 3=Moderately active, 5=Very active]. Q 1
variable.comment: Please find encoded value descriptions in associated documents. Some of the values might be encoded and code descriptions have not been submitted at this time. Please consult the document at http://www.cardia.dopm.uab.edu/study-information/nhlbi-data-repository-data/cardia-documentation.
